thread.title: Comcast Goes Public on Plan for Fox Bid to Challenge Disney

author: Shalini Ramachandran
title: Comcast Goes Public on Plan for Fox Bid to Challenge Disney

organizations.name: 21st century fox that walt disney co.

text:
Cable giant Comcast Corp. said it is in advanced stages of preparing a higher, all-cash offer for the assets of 21st Century Fox that Walt Disney Co. has agreed to buy, an effort it made public Wednesday to convince Fox shareholders of its seriousness.
Earlier this month, The Wall Street Journal and others reported that Comcast was considering making a play to break up that $52.4 billion all-stock Disney deal and had lined up around $60 billion in financing for an all-cash offer.
